author: WarioLGP
description:
On an 8x8 chess board, the Defuser will need to guide the Knight to an invisible goal.
The Espert will determine the end goal by using the number shown on the display, and a little edgework.
manualUrl: https://www.jotform.us/uploads/KeepTalking/62686042776162/3786233358018586563/On the subjet of the Knight's Tour.pdf
name: Knight's Tour
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
